summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CineScript video transcription app with light glassmorphism design. All backend APIs (17/17) working perfectly. Frontend flows including registration, dashboard, project creation, and editor interface all functioning correctly. The app successfully implements the requested features: landing page with new design, user auth, project management, video upload interface, transcription controls, translation functionality, and settings dialog.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (17/17 endpoints working)
User registration with email/password/name validation
User login flow with existing credentials
JWT token authentication and authorization
Project CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Video upload functionality with file validation
Video transcription API endpoint
Translation API endpoint with language selection
Subtitle editing and settings management
Landing page loads with light glassmorphism design elements
Navigation buttons and CTAs work correctly
User registration form with proper validation
Dashboard loads after successful authentication
Project creation dialog with name and description fields
Project cards display correctly in dashboard grid
Video upload dialog with file input functionality
Editor interface with video player container
Settings dialog with font size slider and color pickers
Subtitle panel and editing interface
Navigation between landing, auth, dashboard, and editor pages
Responsive design with proper glassmorphism effects
Toast notifications for user feedback
Proper error handling and validation messages

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI flows and integrations working correctly)
